trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a listener should trace a message based on the source of a trace.
trans-unit.target: 指示侦听器是否应基于跟踪源跟踪消息。

trans-unit.source: One of several different types of filters can be assigned to a trace listener to provide a layer of screening beyond that provided by the trace switch.
trans-unit.target: 多种不同类型的筛选器之一可以分配到的跟踪侦听器提供的额外筛选跟踪交换机提供的层。

trans-unit.source: The filter can be used to control the level of tracing that is produced by the listener.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用筛选器来控制侦听器生成的跟踪级别。

trans-unit.source: This class filters events based on a specific trace source set by the user.
trans-unit.target: 此类筛选基于由用户设置的特定跟踪源的事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceFilter> overrides the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceFilter.ShouldTrace%2A> method and defines a <xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceFilter.Source%2A> property that specifies the name of the trace source to be traced by the listener.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceFilter> 重写<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceFilter.ShouldTrace%2A>方法，并定义<xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceFilter.Source%2A>属性，用于指定要跟踪侦听器的跟踪源的名称。

trans-unit.source: This filter is provided because multiple trace sources can simultaneously use the same trace listener.
trans-unit.target: 提供此筛选器，因为多个跟踪源都能同时使用相同的跟踪侦听器。

trans-unit.source: The name of the trace source.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪源的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.SourceFilter" /> class, specifying the name of the trace source.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.SourceFilter" /> 类的新实例，并且指定跟踪源的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `source` parameter is used to initialize the <xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceFilter.Source%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 值`source`参数用于初始化<xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceFilter.Source%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example calls the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource.TraceData%2A> method using two different source filters, one with a fictitious name, the other with the name of the current trace source.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例调用<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource.TraceData%2A>方法使用两个不同源筛选器，使用虚构的名称，另一种具有当前跟踪源的名称。

trans-unit.source: In the first case, the trace is not written to the console; in the second case, the trace is written.
trans-unit.target: 在第一种情况下，跟踪不写入到控制台;在第二个情况下，跟踪被写入。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource>类。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the information cache for the trace event.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示跟踪事件的信息缓存。

trans-unit.source: The name of the source.
trans-unit.target: 源的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that identifies the event type.
trans-unit.target: 标识事件类型的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: A trace identifier number.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪标识符编号。

trans-unit.source: The format to use for writing an array of arguments or a message to write.
trans-unit.target: 写入参数数组时要使用的格式，或要写入的消息。

trans-unit.source: An array of argument objects.
trans-unit.target: 参数对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: A trace data object.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪数据对象。

trans-unit.source: An array of trace data objects.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪数据对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the trace listener should trace the event.
trans-unit.target: 确定跟踪侦听器是否应跟踪该事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the trace should be produced; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应产生跟踪，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `source` parameter matches the value of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceFilter.Source%2A> property, the method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`source`参数匹配的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceFilter.Source%2A>属性，该方法返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the trace source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置跟踪源的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the trace source.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪源的名称。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceFilter.Source%2A> identifies the trace source for which to write trace information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.SourceFilter.Source%2A> 标识要为其写入跟踪信息的跟踪源。

trans-unit.source: Trace information will not be written for other trace sources.
trans-unit.target: 对于其他跟踪源将不写入跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: The name of the trace source is the `name` parameter from the constructor for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource>.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪源的名称是`name`参数的构造函数从<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource>。

trans-unit.source: The value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该值为 <see langword="null" />。
